name: Slack Slash Command for ZenDesk
description: Use a slash command and a dialog to create a ticket in ZenDesk. Once it has been created, send a message to the user with information about their ticket.

PORT.description: The port that you want to run the web server on.

ZENDESK_EMAIL.description: E-mail address of user for authentication to Zendesk.

ZENDESK_API_TOKEN.description: API tocken for user authentication to Zendesk.

ZENDESK_GUIDE_URL.description: URL of your Zendesk guide (for linking end-users to submitted tickets).
